Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_FINAL_STAGE_LOOT
Tunable.description: The loot we will apply if the player runs the narrative.set_stage_final_conservation_narrative cheat.

Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_INTERMEDIATE_STAGE_LOOT
Tunable.description: The loot we will apply if the player runs the narrative.set_stage_intermediate_conservation_narrative cheat.

Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_NARRATIVE_FINAL_STAGE
Tunable.description: The final island narrative stage. Used for locking narrative stages based on cheats.

Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_NARRATIVE_INTERMEDIATE_STAGE
Tunable.description: The intermediate island narrative stage. Used for locking narrative stages based on cheats.

Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_NARRATIVE_START_STAGE
Tunable.description: The least conserved island narrative stage. Used for locking narrative stages based on cheats.

Tunable.name: CONSERVATION_START_STAGE_LOOT
Tunable.description: The loot we will apply if the player runs the narrative.restart_conservation_narrative cheat.
